Personal CV of Leon

Graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Finance from Chongqing University in June 2021, Leon has completed internships at several financial institutions including Guojin Securities Research Institute, Taiping Financial Services, Taiping Assets, and Noah International. He focused on fundamental asset analysis, market and industry research, customer data analytics, and the development of risk models for financial products. He obtained a Master's degree in Applied Economics at Nanyang Technological University in Singapore in January 2024, specializing in data analysis and machine learning. During his academic journey, he engaged in multifactor analysis, behavioral finance research, secondary market research, and developed proficiency in various programming languages and software tools.

2021年6月从重庆大学金融专业本科毕业。在太平资产、诺亚国际、国金证券研究所、太平金融服务进行了实习。主要经历包括资产基本面分析、市场及行业研究、客户数据分析和金融产品风险模型开发。2024年1月获得新加坡南洋理工大学应用经济学硕士学位，专注于数据分析与机器学习，数量方法，实验经济学等。在校期间，参与了多因子分析、行为金融研究、二级市场研究，并且精通多种编程语言和软件工具。

中文简历
English CV

Basic Experience:

  • June 2021: Graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Finance from Chongqing University.
  • 2020 to 2023: Interned at Guojin Securities Research Institute, Taiping Financial Services, Taiping Assets, and Noah International, focusing on fundamental analysis of assets, market and industry analysis, customer data analysis, and risk modeling of financial products.
  • October 2022 to January 2024: Enrolled in the Master of Science in Applied Economics program at Nanyang Technological University.
  • During the academic journey, engaged in multifactor analysis, behavioral finance, secondary market research, and data cleansing. Additionally, developed practical skills in various programming languages and software tools.

Last update: March 2024
